name: Accessibility
description: Diagnoses common accessibility problems affecting screen readers and other assistive technology.

results.name: testMenuRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that element of role "menu" and "menubar" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testGridRoleForRequiredChidren
results.description: Ensure that elements of role "grid" have required owned elements in accordance with WAI-ARIA.

results.name: testForAriaLabelledBySpelling
results.description: Ensure that "aria-labelledby" is spelled correctly.

results.name: testForMultipleBanners
results.description: Ensure that only one banner is used on the page.

results.name: testForLinkLabels
results.description: Ensure that links have accessible labels for assistive technology.

domNodes: html > body.base.page.basicpage > main > div:nth-child(4) > div.section-toggle:nth-child(5) > div.section-toggle-container > div.section-control.parbase:nth-child(2) > div.section-control-container.column-container.background-white.top-padding-ten.bottom-padding-twenty.medium.jump-link-target.gutter-twenty[data-jump-link-analytics="jump link not set"] > div.box-shadow-container > div.container-fluid.main-content > div.row.justify-content-center > div.col-md-10.offset-md-1 > div.row > div.par-100.col-12.section-par.one-col-100.par-1 > div.alternate-cta-panel.parbase > div.alternate-cta-panel.background-blue[style="background-image:url(/content/dam/redcrossblood/rcb/cta-background/Blood-drive-background-03.jpg.img.jpeg)"] > div.alternate-cta-container[data-context="alternate-cta-panel"] > div.row:nth-child(2) > div.col-md-9.div-cta-button > div > div.redcross-button.center[data-context="redcross-button"] > a[data-aa-link-button="alternate-cta-panel link button not set"][href="/donate-blood/blood-donation-process/what-happens-to-donated-blood.html"]
